description: This PHP source file handles API endpoints related to EasyConnect features, including token generation, validation, and request processing for WiFi configuration and DPP (Device Provisioning Protocol) setup.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Generates or retrieves an encryption key used for token encryption, either from a file or by generating a new one.

methods.name: genToken
methods.description: Creates an encrypted token with an expiration time using AES-128-CBC encryption, for client authentication.

methods.name: validateToken
methods.description: Decrypts and validates an encrypted token to check if it is still valid based on expiration time.

methods.name: processPostRequest
methods.description: Processes incoming POST requests related to DPP setup, including parsing the request body and updating WiFi access point parameters.

methods.name: authenticateCaller
methods.description: Performs authentication based on header tokens or passphrases, generating or validating tokens as needed.
